name: bj-modalbe

stmt.origin: sylg(s0, w0, wex(s0, w0), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wex(s0, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wn(w0)))))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), wex(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wex(s0, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wn(w0)))))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), wex(s0, w0))

|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wex(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), wex(s0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), wex(s0, w0))
-| wb(wex(s0, w0), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wex(s0, w0)))
-| wb(wex(s0, w0), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))

comment: The predicate-calculus version of the axiom (B) of modal logic. See also ~ modal-b . (Contributed by BJ, 20-Oct-2019.)
